title: Software Developer
description: Builds and maintains software applications used on web, mobile, or desktops.
required_skills: Programming, DSA, OOP, Problem Solving, Git
suitable_interests: coding, building apps, logic puzzles, tech
education_path: 10th → 11-12th Science (PCM/PCMB) or Commerce with Maths → B.Tech/B.Sc CS/IT → internships → SDE role

title: Web Developer
description: Creates and maintains websites and web applications.
required_skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Databases
education_path: 10th → 11-12th Science or Commerce → BCA/B.Sc CS/B.Tech IT → web dev projects → web developer
